price: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Knowing,
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ
